test.name: count_aggregation_comparison
test.query: SELECT count(), count(BY UserID % {group_scale}), count(TOTALS) FROM test.hits GROUP BY CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale} FORMAT Null
SELECT DISTINCT count() OVER (PARTITION BY CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale}), count() OVER (PARTITION BY UserID), count() OVER () FROM test.hits FORMAT Null
SELECT count() FROM test.hits GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale}), (CounterID % 13),()) FORMAT Null
